product_name: Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Trapper Knife
long_description: Durable, highly visible and unbelievably tough for year-round use, the Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Trapper Knife has a chrome vanadium clip and spey blades that are perfect for everyday use.
short_description: Durable, highly visible and unbelievably tough for year-round use, the Case Cutlery Yellow Synthetic Trapper Knife has a chrome vanadium clip and spey blades that are perfect for everyday use.
